Thank you Phoenix IDA for your vote of trust and confidence.  #YesPHX

ReplyBuy is powering the next generation of sales, engagement & data for businesses using mobile messaging.  ReplyBuy empowers businesses to harness the power of chat, AI, digital commerce and payments to start a conversation & instantly transact with their buyers from a single dashboard. As a first vertical ReplyBuy was introduced within the sports market and has quickly been embraced by 120+ clients across the NBA, NFL, NHL along with major universities. From a sales and buyer conversion standpoint it's now starting to outperform traditional means such as email and social.
An organization where early stage social entrepreneurs can receive the support, mentorship, guidance and resources necessary to bring their concept to fruition.

Addoway's a next generation online marketplace for all things fashion, electronics, collectibles and more where shoppers are able to purchase from trustworthy merchants utilizing social networks, friends and recommendations.
Blogic is a new service that instantly generates a branded theme which matches your website allowing site owners and early stage companies to save money, time, headaches, etc.

July 27, 2012, Chris worked with Joshua but at different companies

I have known Josh for awhile and his business acumen and professional demeanor are first class.  Josh has an amazing ability to establish solid relationships and work with indivduals from all walks of life. His ability to open doors and build relationships with individuals, organizations, and companies is a true testament to not only his knowledge of any market sector, but his overall character as an individual.  Josh possesses a true skill to assess and understand the technical competency of any project or venture.  His ability to vet a concept and structure a monetization strategy is second to none.  It is a great pleasure working with Josh on various projects and I am sure if you get the opportunity to work with him in the future, you will find that my remarks hold true.

summary: Josh is the CEO and founder of ReplyBuy, Inc. His work as an entrepreneur has been covered by leading publications including SportsBusiness Journal, ESPN, Business Week, WSJ, Entrepreneur Magazine, PC World, INC. Magazine and The New York Times. Mr. Manley received his B.F.A. from Westmont College in Santa Barbara, CA. where he also served as class president.
